name: Synthetic Customer Interviews
description: AI generates customer personas from market data and simulates interview responses to pain hypotheses. Clearly marked SIMULATED.
inputs: Pain hypotheses; ICP hypothesis; domain research
outputs: Simulated interview transcripts; pain validation signals

name: Synthetic Expert Interviews
description: AI simulates domain expert perspectives on market dynamics pain prevalence and solution viability.

name: Synthetic Value Prop Testing
description: AI personas evaluate value propositions from the customer perspective. Tests resonance and differentiation.
outputs: Ranked VPs with simulated customer reactions

name: Synthetic Solution Testing
description: AI personas experience a described solution or prototype and provide usability and desirability feedback.
inputs: Solution description or prototype; ICP definition

name: Synthetic NVB Board Feedback
description: AI-simulated New Venture Board reviews current venture progress and provides feedback without a formal Go/No-Go. On-demand.
outputs: Board-style feedback with questions and concerns

name: Competitive Analysis via Deep Research
description: Web-enabled deep competitive analysis: players positioning funding weaknesses recent moves.

name: Market Sizing via Deep Research
description: Web-enabled market sizing research: TAM/SAM/SOM data industry reports analyst estimates.

name: Vibe Code — Early Wedge Product
description: AI-assisted rapid creation of an early wedge product for testing via natural language prompting.

name: Vibe Code — Landing Pages
description: AI-assisted creation of landing pages to test messaging and capture user interest before product is built.

name: Vibe Code — Ads
description: AI-assisted creation of ad copy and creatives for paid acquisition experiments.
outputs: Ad copy variants for A/B testing

name: Listen Labs Integration
description: Import AI-led interview results from Listen Labs platform for synthesis into VB templates.
outputs: Interview synthesis in VB template format

name: Maze Integration
description: Import usability testing and concept testing results from Maze platform.

name: UserTesting Integration
description: Import user research data from UserTesting platform for synthesis.
